00021 XTempControl::XChannel::XChannel(const char *name, bool runtime,
00022     const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &list)
00023  : XNode(name, runtime), 
00024    m_thermometer(create<XItemNode<XThermometerList, XThermometer> >(
00025         "Thermometer", false, list)),
00026    m_excitation(create<XComboNode>("Excitation", false))
00027 {
00028     try {
00029         m_thermometer->str(XString("Raw"));
00030     }
00031     catch (XKameError &e) {
00032         e.print();
00033     }
00034 }

00036 XTempControl::XTempControl(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00037    const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00038    const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00039    const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00040    const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00041     XPrimaryDriver(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00042     m_channels(create<XChannelList>("Channels", false)),
00043     m_currentChannel
00044         (create<XItemNode<XChannelList, XChannel> >("CurrentChannel", true, m_channels)),
00045     m_setupChannel
00046         (create<XItemNode<XChannelList, XChannel> >("SetupChannel", true, m_channels)),
00047     m_targetTemp(create<XDoubleNode>("TargetTemp", true, "%.5g")),
00048     m_manualPower(create<XDoubleNode>("ManualPower", true, "%.4g")),
00049     m_prop(create<XDoubleNode>("P", false, "%.4g")),
00050     m_int(create<XDoubleNode>("I", false, "%.4g")),
00051     m_deriv(create<XDoubleNode>("D", false, "%.4g")),
00052     m_heaterMode(create<XComboNode>("HeaterMode", false, true)),
00053     m_powerRange(create<XComboNode>("PowerRange", false, true)),
00054     m_heaterPower(create<XDoubleNode>("HeaterPower", false, "%.4g")),
00055     m_sourceTemp(create<XDoubleNode>("SourceTemp", false, "%.5g")),
00056     m_extDCSource
00057         (create<XItemNode<XDriverList, XDCSource> >("ExtDCSource", false, drivers)),
00058     m_extDCSourceChannel(create<XComboNode>("ExtDCSourceChannel", false, true)),
00059     m_stabilized(create<XDoubleNode>("Stabilized", true, "%g")),
00060     m_form(new FrmTempControl(g_pFrmMain))
00061 {
00062   m_conSetupChannel = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(
00063                         m_setupChannel, m_form->m_cmbSetupChannel);
00064   m_conCurrentChannel = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(
00065                         m_currentChannel, m_form->m_cmbSourceChannel);
00066   m_conPowerRange = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(
00067                         m_powerRange, m_form->m_cmbPowerRange);
00068   m_conHeaterMode = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(
00069                         m_heaterMode, m_form->m_cmbHeaterMode);
00070   m_conP = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_prop, m_form->m_edP);
00071   m_conI = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_int, m_form->m_edI);
00072   m_conD = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_deriv, m_form->m_edD);
00073   m_conManualPower = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_manualPower, m_form->m_edManHeater);
00074   m_conTargetTemp = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_targetTemp, m_form->m_edTargetTemp);
00075   m_conHeater = xqcon_create<XQLCDNumberConnector>(
00076                      m_heaterPower, m_form->m_lcdHeater);
00077   m_conTemp = xqcon_create<XQLCDNumberConnector>(
00078                      m_sourceTemp, m_form->m_lcdSourceTemp); 
00079   m_conExtDCSource = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(
00080                         m_extDCSource, m_form->m_cmbExtDCSrc);
00081   m_conExtDCSourceChannel = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(
00082                         m_extDCSourceChannel, m_form->m_cmbExtDCSrcCh);
00083  
00084   m_currentChannel->setUIEnabled(false);
00085   m_powerRange->setUIEnabled(false);
00086   m_heaterMode->setUIEnabled(false);
00087   m_prop->setUIEnabled(false);
00088   m_int->setUIEnabled(false);
00089   m_deriv->setUIEnabled(false);
00090   m_manualPower->setUIEnabled(false);
00091   m_targetTemp->setUIEnabled(false);
00092   
00093   m_extDCSource->setUIEnabled(true);
00094   m_extDCSourceChannel->setUIEnabled(true);
00095   m_lsnOnExtDCSourceChanged = m_extDCSource->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00096                   shared_from_this(), &XTempControl::onExtDCSourceChanged);
00097 
00098   m_lsnOnSetupChannelChanged = m_setupChannel->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00099                   shared_from_this(), &XTempControl::onSetupChannelChanged);
00100 
00101   m_form->statusBar()->hide();
00102   m_form->setWindowTitle(i18n("TempControl - ") + getLabel() );
00103 }

00109     m_form->raise();

00112 void
00113 XTempControl::start()
00114 {
00115   if(shared_ptr<XDCSource>(*extDCSource())) {
00116     heaterMode()->clear();
00117     heaterMode()->add("Off");
00118     heaterMode()->add("PID");
00119     heaterMode()->add("Man");
00120   }
00121   else
00122     m_powerRange->setUIEnabled(true);
00123 
00124   m_thread.reset(new XThread<XTempControl>(shared_from_this(), &XTempControl::execute));
00125   m_thread->resume();
00126 
00127   m_currentChannel->setUIEnabled(true);
00128   m_heaterMode->setUIEnabled(true);
00129   m_prop->setUIEnabled(true);
00130   m_int->setUIEnabled(true);
00131   m_deriv->setUIEnabled(true);
00132   m_manualPower->setUIEnabled(true);
00133   m_targetTemp->setUIEnabled(true);
00134   
00135   m_extDCSource->setUIEnabled(false);
00136   m_extDCSourceChannel->setUIEnabled(false);
00137 }
00138 void
00139 XTempControl::stop()
00140 {
00141   m_currentChannel->setUIEnabled(false);
00142   m_powerRange->setUIEnabled(false);
00143   m_heaterMode->setUIEnabled(false);
00144   m_prop->setUIEnabled(false);
00145   m_int->setUIEnabled(false);
00146   m_deriv->setUIEnabled(false);
00147   m_manualPower->setUIEnabled(false);
00148   m_targetTemp->setUIEnabled(false);
00149     
00150   m_extDCSource->setUIEnabled(true);
00151   m_extDCSourceChannel->setUIEnabled(true);  
00152 
00153     if(m_thread) m_thread->terminate();
00154 //    m_thread->waitFor();
00155 //  thread must do interface()->close() at the end
00156 }
00157 
00158 void
00159 XTempControl::analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&)
00160 {
00161     try {
00162         for(;;) {
00163             //! Since raw buffer is Fast-in Fast-out, use the same sequence of push()es for pop()s
00164             uint16_t chno = pop<uint16_t>();
00165             pop<uint16_t>(); //reserve
00166             float raw = pop<float>();
00167             float temp = pop<float>();
00168             if(!m_multiread) chno = 0;
00169             if(chno >= m_entry_temps.size()) throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00170             m_entry_temps[chno]->value(temp);
00171             m_entry_raws[chno]->value(raw);
00172         }
00173     }
00174     catch (XRecordError&) {
00175     }
00176 }
00177 void
00178 XTempControl::visualize()
00179 {
00180  //! impliment extra codes which do not need write-lock of record
00181  //! record is read-locked
00182 }
00183 void
00184 XTempControl::onSetupChannelChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00185 {
00186   m_conThermometer.reset();
00187   m_conExcitation.reset();
00188   m_lsnOnExcitationChanged.reset();
00189   shared_ptr<XChannel> channel = *m_setupChannel;
00190   if(!channel) return;
00191   m_conThermometer = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(
00192         channel->thermometer(), m_form->m_cmbThermometer);
00193   m_conExcitation = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(
00194         channel->excitation(), m_form->m_cmbExcitation);
00195   m_lsnOnExcitationChanged = channel->excitation()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00196                 shared_from_this(), &XTempControl::onExcitationChanged);
00197 }
00198 
00199 void
00200 XTempControl::createChannels(const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00201     const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers, 
00202     bool multiread, const char **channel_names, const char **excitations)
00203 {
00204   shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> entries(scalarentries);
00205   m_multiread = multiread;
00206   
00207   for(int i = 0; channel_names[i]; i++) {
00208       shared_ptr<XChannel> channel = 
00209         m_channels->create<XChannel>(channel_names[i], true, thermometers);  
00210       for(int j = 0; excitations[j]; j++) {
00211         channel->excitation()->add(excitations[j]);
00212       }
00213   }
00214   if(multiread)
00215     {
00216       atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(m_channels->children());
00217       if(list) { 
00218           for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00219             shared_ptr<XChannel> channel = dynamic_pointer_cast<XChannel>(*it);
00220             shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entry_temp(create<XScalarEntry>(
00221               QString("Ch.%1").arg(channel->getName()).toLatin1().data()
00222               , false,
00223                dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this())
00224               , "%.5g"));
00225             shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entry_raw(create<XScalarEntry>(
00226               QString("Ch.%1.raw").arg(channel->getName()).toLatin1().data()
00227               , false,
00228                dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this())
00229               , "%.5g"));
00230              m_entry_temps.push_back(entry_temp);
00231              m_entry_raws.push_back(entry_raw);
00232              entries->insert(entry_temp);
00233              entries->insert(entry_raw);
00234           }
00235       }
00236     }
00237   else
00238     {
00239         shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entry_temp(create<XScalarEntry>(
00240           "Temp"
00241           , false,
00242            dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this())
00243           , "%.5g"));
00244         shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entry_raw(create<XScalarEntry>(
00245           "Raw"
00246           , false,
00247            dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this())
00248           , "%.5g"));
00249          m_entry_temps.push_back(entry_temp);
00250          m_entry_raws.push_back(entry_raw);
00251          entries->insert(entry_temp);
00252          entries->insert(entry_raw);
00253     }
00254 }
00255 
00256 double
00257 XTempControl::pid(XTime time, double temp)
00258 {
00259     double p = *prop();
00260     double i = *interval();
00261     double d = *deriv();
00262 
00263     double dt = temp - *targetTemp();
00264     double dxdt = 0.0;
00265     double acc = 0.0;
00266     if((i > 0) && (time - m_pidLastTime < i)) {
00267         m_pidAccum += (time - m_pidLastTime) * dt;
00268         dxdt = (temp - m_pidLastTemp) / (time - m_pidLastTime); 
00269         acc = m_pidAccum / i;
00270         acc = - std::min(std::max(- acc * p, -2.0), 100.0) / p;
00271         m_pidAccum = acc * i;
00272     }
00273     else
00274         m_pidAccum = 0;
00275 
00276     m_pidLastTime = time;
00277     m_pidLastTemp = temp;
00278 
00279     return -(dt + acc + dxdt * d) * p;
00280 }
00281 void *
00282 XTempControl::execute(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00283 {
00284   double tempAvg = 0.0;
00285   double tempErrAvg = 0.0;
00286   XTime lasttime = XTime::now();
00287   
00288   m_lsnOnPChanged = prop()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00289                 shared_from_this(), &XTempControl::onPChanged);
00290   m_lsnOnIChanged = interval()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00291                 shared_from_this(), &XTempControl::onIChanged);
00292   m_lsnOnDChanged = deriv()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00293                 shared_from_this(), &XTempControl::onDChanged);
00294   m_lsnOnTargetTempChanged = targetTemp()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00295                 shared_from_this(), &XTempControl::onTargetTempChanged);
00296   m_lsnOnManualPowerChanged = manualPower()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00297                 shared_from_this(), &XTempControl::onManualPowerChanged);
00298   m_lsnOnHeaterModeChanged = heaterMode()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00299                 shared_from_this(), &XTempControl::onHeaterModeChanged);
00300   m_lsnOnPowerRangeChanged = powerRange()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00301                 shared_from_this(), &XTempControl::onPowerRangeChanged);
00302   m_lsnOnCurrentChannelChanged = m_currentChannel->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00303                 shared_from_this(), &XTempControl::onCurrentChannelChanged);
00304     
00305   while(!terminated)
00306     {
00307       msecsleep(10);
00308 
00309       double raw, src_raw = 0, src_temp = 0, temp;
00310       clearRaw();
00311       XTime time_awared = XTime::now();
00312       // try/catch exception of communication errors
00313       try {
00314           shared_ptr<XChannel> src_ch = *m_currentChannel;
00315           if(src_ch)
00316             {
00317               shared_ptr<XThermometer> thermo = *src_ch->thermometer();
00318               src_raw = getRaw(src_ch);
00319               src_temp = (!thermo) ? src_raw : thermo->getTemp(src_raw);
00320               m_sourceTemp->value(src_temp);
00321             }
00322           atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(m_channels->children());
00323           if(list) { 
00324               unsigned int idx = 0;
00325               for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00326                 shared_ptr<XChannel> ch = dynamic_pointer_cast<XChannel>(*it);
00327                   if(src_ch == ch)
00328                     {
00329                       temp = src_temp;
00330                       raw = src_raw;
00331                     }
00332                   else
00333                     {
00334                       if(!m_multiread) continue;
00335                       shared_ptr<XThermometer> thermo = *ch->thermometer();
00336                       raw = getRaw(ch);
00337                       temp = (!thermo) ? raw : thermo->getTemp(raw);
00338                     }
00339                   push((uint16_t)idx);
00340                   push((uint16_t)0); // reserve
00341                   push(float(raw));
00342                   push(float(temp));
00343                   idx++;
00344                 }
00345           }
00346             
00347           //calicurate std. deviations in some periods
00348           double tau = *interval() * 4.0;
00349           if(tau <= 1) tau = 4.0;
00350           XTime newtime = XTime::now();
00351           double dt = newtime - lasttime;
00352           lasttime = newtime;
00353           double terr = src_temp - *targetTemp();
00354           tempAvg = (tempAvg - temp) * exp(-dt / tau) + temp;
00355           tempErrAvg = (tempErrAvg - terr * terr) * exp(-dt / tau) + terr * terr;
00356           tempErrAvg = std::min(tempErrAvg, src_temp * src_temp);
00357           stabilized()->value(sqrt(tempErrAvg)); //stderr
00358           
00359           double power = 0.0;
00360             if(shared_ptr<XDCSource> dcsrc = *extDCSource()) {
00361                 int ch = *extDCSourceChannel();
00362                 if(ch >= 0) {
00363                     if(src_ch) {
00364                         if(heaterMode()->to_str() == "PID") {
00365                             power = pid(newtime, src_temp);
00366                         }
00367                         if(heaterMode()->to_str() == "Man") {
00368                             power = *manualPower();
00369                         }
00370                     }
00371                     power = std::max(std::min(power, 100.0), 0.0);
00372                     double limit = dcsrc->max(ch, false);
00373                     dcsrc->changeValue(ch, limit * sqrt(power) / 10.0, false);
00374                 }
00375             }
00376             else
00377                 power = getHeater();
00378           
00379           heaterPower()->value(power);
00380       }
00381       catch (XKameError &e) {
00382           e.print(getLabel() + "; ");
00383           continue;
00384       }
00385       finishWritingRaw(time_awared, XTime::now());
00386     }
00387 
00388   m_setupChannel->value(shared_ptr<XThermometer>());
00389     
00390   m_lsnOnPChanged.reset();
00391   m_lsnOnIChanged.reset();
00392   m_lsnOnDChanged.reset();
00393   m_lsnOnTargetTempChanged.reset();
00394   m_lsnOnManualPowerChanged.reset();
00395   m_lsnOnHeaterModeChanged.reset();
00396   m_lsnOnPowerRangeChanged.reset();
00397   m_lsnOnCurrentChannelChanged.reset();
00398 
00399   
00400   afterStop(); 
00401   return NULL;
00402 }
00403 void
00404 XTempControl::onExtDCSourceChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00405 {
00406     extDCSourceChannel()->clear();
00407     if(shared_ptr<XDCSource> dcsrc = *extDCSource()) {
00408         shared_ptr<const std::deque<XItemNodeBase::Item> > strings(dcsrc->channel()->itemStrings());
00409         for(std::deque<XItemNodeBase::Item>::const_iterator it = strings->begin(); it != strings->end(); it++) {
00410             extDCSourceChannel()->add(it->label);
00411         }
00412     }
00413 }
00414 void
00415 XTempControl::onPChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00416 {
00417     try {
00418         if(!shared_ptr<XDCSource>(*extDCSource()))
00419             onPChanged(*prop());
00420     }
00421     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError& e) {
00422         e.print();
00423     }
00424 }
00425 void
00426 XTempControl::onIChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00427 {
00428     try {
00429         if(!shared_ptr<XDCSource>(*extDCSource()))
00430             onIChanged(*interval());
00431     }
00432     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError& e) {
00433         e.print();
00434     }
00435 }

00437 XTempControl::onDChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)

00440         if(!shared_ptr<XDCSource>(*extDCSource()))
00441             onDChanged(*deriv());
00442     }
00443     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError& e) {
00444         e.print();
00445     }
00446 }

00459 XTempControl::onManualPowerChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)

00469 void
00470 XTempControl::onHeaterModeChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00471 {
00472     m_pidAccum = 0;
00473     try {
00474         if(!shared_ptr<XDCSource>(*extDCSource()))
00475             onHeaterModeChanged(*heaterMode());
00476     }
00477     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError& e) {
00478         e.print();
00479     }
00480 }

00482 XTempControl::onPowerRangeChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00483 {
00484     try {
00485         if(!shared_ptr<XDCSource>(*extDCSource()))
00486             onPowerRangeChanged(*powerRange());
00487     }
00488     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError& e) {
00489         e.print();
00490     }
00491 }
00492 void
00493 XTempControl::onCurrentChannelChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00494 {
00495     m_pidAccum = 0;
00496     try {
00497         shared_ptr<XChannel> ch(*currentChannel());
00498         if(!ch) return;
00499         onCurrentChannelChanged(ch);
00500     }
00501     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError& e) {
00502         e.print();
00503     }
00504 }
00505 void
00506 XTempControl::onExcitationChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node)
00507 {
00508     try {
00509         shared_ptr<XChannel> ch;
00510         atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(channels()->children());
00511         if(list) { 
00512             for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00513                 shared_ptr<XChannel> _ch = dynamic_pointer_cast<XChannel>(*it);
00514                 if(_ch->excitation() == node)
00515                     ch = _ch;
00516             }
00517         }
00518         if(!ch) return;
00519         int exc = *ch->excitation();
00520         if(exc < 0) return;
00521         onExcitationChanged(ch, exc);
00522     }
00523     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError& e) {
00524         e.print();
00525     }
00526 }
